original: induction l as [ | [x v] l IHl ]; simpl; intros m Hl Hin x v. - intuition_in. - apply NoDupA_cons in Hl as (Hxl & Hl). rewrite fold_left_app. rewrite S.gsspec. destruct Hin as [ Hin | (Hnxv & Hinv)]. + subst x. rewrite Hnxv. split; intro H; [ right | left ]; auto. split; auto. intro Hx. apply Hnxv. eapply Hinv; eauto. + rewrite IHl; eauto. intuition_in.
